row.entry: This module is an artistic feature which creates vignetting (modification of the brightness/saturation at the borders).

sect3.title: Usage
sect3.para: The vignetting module has extensive parameters to precisely tune your effect.

sect4.title: scale
sect4.para: Set radii of the vignetting beginning.

sect4.title: fall-off strength
sect4.para: Set the progressiveness of the fall-off.

sect4.title: strength
sect4.para: Set the strength of the effect.

sect4.title: uniformity
sect4.para: Set the uniformity of the effect.

sect4.title: b/s ratio
sect4.para: Set the ratio of brightness and saturation the vignetting should apply on.

sect4.title: saturation
sect4.para: Invert the effect of saturation. By default the vignetting desaturates at the border. Using this button you can saturate it.

sect4.title: fall-off
sect4.para: Invert the effect of brightness. By default the vignetting darkens at the border. Using this button you can brighter it.
